text: Boy 7 is a 2015 German action film based on the eponymous novel by Mirjam Mous. == Cast == * David Kross - Sam (Boy 7) * Emilia Schüle - Lara (Girl 8) * - Louis (Boy 6) * Jens Harzer - Isaak * Liv Lisa Fries - Safira * - Boy 35 * - Direktor Fredersen == See also == * Boy 7 (Netherlands, 2015) == References == == External links == * Category:2015 action thriller films Category:German action thriller films Category:German films Category:Films about amnesia Category:Films based on Dutch novels
title: Boy 7 (2015 German film)
